sk1.name: Mirror Image
sk1.desc: Creates three images of Naga Siren under her control.

sk2.name: Ensnare
sk2.desc: Interrupts the target and traps them in place, preventing movement or blinking.

sk3.name: Rip Tide
sk3.desc: The Naga Siren and her images hit all nearby units with a damaging wave of water that lowers armor for 8 seconds.

sk4.name: Song Of The Siren
sk4.desc: All enemies in range of the Naga Siren are put into a magical stasis where they cannot act or be attacked. Using Song of the Siren again will end the duration early.
